author: pdobacz
content: To anyone following the EOF specs: there's a proposal to rename some instructions https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/pull/64 after the EOF Implementers Call. Let us know if any strong opinions against this particular choice of names.

author: kflcsd
content:
I want to implement a secure sub-contract token collection, but during this period, I encountered a problem. The value of codehash is equal to hash (0x) when there is a balance.
In response to this problem, I thought about it carefully, and it seems that there is no need to take into account BALANCE in ERC1052, so I proposed to optimize opcode EXTCODEHASH.
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-8261-extcodehash-optimize/18946/1

author: wjmelements
content: Several searchers have found a way to perform eth_estimateGas without binary searching execution. The main difficulties were the SSTORE minimum gas and the L-function.
